public ConversationService(int fileUploadSizeThreshold,

Parameters:
fileUploadSizeThreshold - The size in bytes beyond which uploaded files will be stored to disk
fileUploadDirectory - The directory in which to place uploaded files

The conversation cookies.

This value is cached locally.

getCookie

public ConversationCookie getCookie(String name)
Gets a conversation cookie by name.

Returns:
The conversation cookie or null

createCookie

public ConversationCookie createCookie(String name)
Returns a new conversation cookie instance if the cookie doesn't exist yet, or the existing cookie if it does. Note that the cookie will not be saved into the response until you call ConversationCookie.save().

Parameters:
name - The cookie name
Returns:
A new cookie or the existing cookie

isInternal

public boolean isInternal()
Checks if the request was received via the RIAP protocol

Returns:
True if the request was received via the RIAP protocol
See Also:
LocalReference

getIsInternal

public boolean getIsInternal()
Identical to isInternal(). Supports scripting engines which don't know how to recognize the "is" getter notation, but can recognize the "get" notation.

Returns:
True if the request was received via the RIAP protocol
See Also:
isInternal()

getPathToBase

public String getPathToBase()
The relative path that would reach the base URI of the application if appended to the current resource URI.

Returns:
The relative path

getQueryAll

public Form getQueryAll()
The URI query as a list. Includes duplicate keys.

This value is cached locally.

Returns:
The query form

getQuery

public Map<String,String> getQuery()
The URI query as a map. In the case of duplicate keys, only the first one will appear.

This value is cached locally.

Returns:
The query map

getFormAll

public Form getFormAll()
The form, sent via POST or PUT, as a list. Includes duplicate keys. Uploaded files will appear as instances of FileParameter.

This value is cached locally.

Returns:
The form

getForm

public Map<String,Object> getForm()
The form, sent via POST or PUT, as a map. In the case of duplicate keys, only the last one will appear. Uploaded files will appear as instances of FileParameter. Other fields will be plain strings.

This value is cached locally.

Returns:
The form

getDisposition

public Disposition getDisposition()
The representation's disposition.

Returns:
A disposition

public Form getHeaders()
The extra response headers

Returns:
The headers

getLocals

public Map<String,Object> getLocals()
The request attributes.

Returns:
The locals

stop

public boolean stop()
Abruptly ends the conversation.

Works by throwing a ConversationStoppedException.

Returns:
Always throws an exception, so nothing is ever returned (some language engines require a return value defined in the signature)
